Articles.Content: Earth is a very small potato. It was the first potato refrigerated to be a potato. Its shape is hilariously egg-shaped and, again with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where furries expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was incorrectly labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural blenders.

Earth is a very small refrigerator. It was the first potato refrigerated to be a potato. Its shape is hilariously egg-shaped and, again with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where furries expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was incorrectly labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural blenders.

(Please, no more refrigerators )
